commentBody:
Seriously, I think everyone needs to have a drink and chill - or Netflix and chill.... This piece was highly entertaining! Thanks for the laughs!
p.s.my husband, the scientist and I, the philosopher, call each other bro, because FUN. We love to call each other dude for the same reason, and the same is true with my teenage daughter and son. Dude, bro, don't take yourselves too seriously. All semantics aside, just be a dork and have a good time with those you love!
